import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Login = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ email: "", password: "" }) const handleChange = (event) => { if (event.target.id === "email") { let email = event.target.value setUser(prevState => { return { ...prevState, email: email} }) } if (event.target.id === "password") { let password = event.target.value setUser(prevState => { return { ...prevState, password: password} }) } } useEffect(()=> { console.log("user state",user) }) const signUpUser = () => { } return(
Sign-In

) console.log(user); } export default Login
